abstract: General Electric has hired Citigroup and JPMorgan Chase to advise on the sale of its Wizard mortgage unit in Australia, Bloomberg News reported citing people with knowledge of the decision.
lead_paragraph: General Electric has hired Citigroup and JPMorgan Chase to advise on the sale of its Wizard mortgage unit in Australia, Bloomberg News reported citing people with knowledge of the decision.

headline.main: G.E. Hires Advisers for Sale of Wizard Unit
